original_text: When David was old and full of days, he made Solomon his son king over Israel.
korean_text: 다윗이 나이가 많아 늙으매 아들 솔로몬을 이스라엘 왕으로 삼고

sentences.original_text: When David was old and full of days
he made Solomon his son king over Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 아들 솔로몬을 이스라엘의 왕으로 삼았다
